import React from 'react' const Careers = () => { return (

Find A Career at Harmony

Come join our team at Harmony United and help make an impact on the world. We are dedicated to improving society with the use of science. All jobs listed are avaiable.

Job Role

Clinical Researcher Coordinator

Participates in the identification of potential investigators and clinical sites, both nationally and internationally; conducts pre-study site visits, collects and reviews data, and prepares evaluative reports.

Job Role

Human Resource

Responsible for managing the employee life cycle (i.e., recruiting, hiring, onboarding, training, and firing employees) and administering employee benefits.

Job Role

Tech Helps

Assist with all things technology, involving frontend, backend, and other technoolgy platforms.

Job Role

Clinical Resaercher Internship

Learn about the basics of how a research group goes about conducting clinical trials.

Apply Here
) } export default Careers
